original_text: You caused your people to have many descendants, as many as the stars in the sky. You brought them to the land that you had promised to their ancestors. You had told them to go and live in it.
korean_text: 주께서 그들의 자손을 하늘의 별같이 많게 하시고 전에 그들의 열조에게 들어가서 차지하라고 말씀하신 땅으로 인도하여 이르게 하셨으므로

sentences.original_text: You caused your people to have many descendants
sentences.korean_translation: 주님은 주의 백성이 많은 자손을 갖게 하셨습니다

sentences.original_text: as many as the stars in the sky
You brought them to the land
that you had promised to their ancestors
You had told them to go
